Opera Recheck - considered at this time, one of the fastest and most flexible in your browser. Using skins, custom panels and other features to configure the interface whose appearance can be changed beyond recognition. The program allows "on the fly" to disable and enable the schedule, but also boasts proprietary technology scaling Web pages through which users browser almost never see a horizontal scroll bar.

1. there are additional menu by right-clicking on the picture / link / site, as well as the left click on the text of 2,3,4 times (Ie hotkliku).
2. changes that do not affect the basic design of Opera, and only add extra functionality you need in the menu.
